Blog.post: busy week, sport, music the usual stuff. couldnt be bothered posting.

had pizza for lunch, a whole bag of marshmellows, a yoghurt top muesli bar, massive dinner, 2 ice creams, hungry jacks a banana, an apple and some salad to eat today. and probably lots of other stuff too! i feel kinda sick though. good luck for your exams ppl...whoever has them anyway. take care.

me and tristan have this assignment due on friday and we're like 20% through it and we've got heaps more to do. errrr, mite be dropped from set one cos i got this test to do to see how my level one grade is like. soccer was tiring, played the thirds and drew. but we're getting pizza which is pretty cool cos we drew against wesley. these blogs are totally pointless. i must be really bored or something, go ipods and i want an ngage. nearly bought one yesterday cept my bank card was demagnatized so i had to get money off mum to buy some cd's. got an lcd screen for the comp today. thats pretty awesome, way better than the last one, this is starting to sound like my life story or something. ok i'm going to go now.

had to do chinese school hw today and it was bad. didn't know how to. happy b'day andrea, had fun in your violin lesson? haha. errr, school was alrite, got music tomorrow morning and got my bank card fixed today so i can go buy something cool! and i put new sheets on my bed and its pretty cool, really random color scheme.

if u read this nat, can u tell me how to put those pics on and the message board things. cos this writing stuff is probably going to get boring. peer tutoring tomorrow morning, legally blonde 1 is on tv. yay...

whoa! that new foxtel digital sports channel was really sik. had a skate and surf today and it was pretty cold. knoxies party, happy b'day to him. started my project due tomorrow. me and tristan are practicing 180 ollies and getting better. meh, i got this blog idea from nat cos hers is pretty cool.
